page.title: 15 FURBERS SHOP
page.content:
{ {Mrs Ila Furber}owns a small general shop near Staplton Cross.She sells meat like pork,beef,bacon,ham and all kinds of grocery items.She also sells many kinds of sweets as well as fruit and vegetables. Her family started the shop in 1926.Ila has worked for 17 years with her mum.Her father died a couple of months ago.Ila has always kept the shop and most of the time she likes her job. The shop is open from 8a.m. _ 5p.m. each weekday.The busiest days of the week are Thursdays,Fridays and Saturday mornings.Not all customers are friendly.Ila and her husband go and order new stock at{Cash and Carry} in Crewkerne on Mondays.
Donna Bowen,Sacha Elswood.
